mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_id, order_detail_id, review_date, review_text) VALUES (seq_review_id.NEXTVAL, #{orderDetailId}, #{reviewDate}, #{reviewText})
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id, r.order_detail_id, r.review_date, TO_CHAR(r.review_text) review_text FROM review r JOIN order_detail od ON r.order_detail_id = od.order_detail_id JOIN product p ON od.product_id = p.product_id JOIN store s ON p.store_id = s.store_id WHERE s.store_url = #{storeUrl} ORDER BY r.review_date DESC
